data.title: CS-320A MCDU
data.tagline: Professional-grade Multipurpose Control Display Unit for flight simulation
data.overview:
The CS-320A MCDU brings airline-quality flight management to your home simulator. Built with the same attention to detail that professional pilots expect, this unit features a high-resolution LCD display, tactile keypads, and seamless integration with major flight simulation platforms.

Whether you're practicing instrument approaches, planning cross-country flights, or simply enjoying the authenticity of airline procedures, the CS-320A delivers an uncompromising simulation experience.

feature_bullets.text: 5.7-inch high-resolution IPS LCD display with anti-glare coating
64 tactile backlit keys with adjustable brightness
Aircraft-grade aluminum chassis with powder coating
Native support for MSFS 2020, X-Plane 12, and Prepar3D
Fully programmable function keys via companion software
Compatible with ProSim, PMDG, and Fenix aircraft
Built-in test mode for hardware diagnostics

content_sections.heading: Crystal Clear Visibility in Any Lighting
content_sections.description:
The 5.7-inch IPS display delivers exceptional color accuracy and viewing angles, ensuring critical flight data remains visible from any cockpit position. With 800x480 resolution and 500 nits brightness, you'll never miss a waypoint or altitude constraint.

The anti-glare coating reduces reflections from ambient lighting, while the adjustable backlight lets you match the display to your cockpit environment.

content_sections.heading: Engineered for Thousands of Hours
content_sections.description:
Every CS-320A is precision-machined from aircraft-grade 6061-T6 aluminum, then finished with a durable powder coating that resists wear and fingerprints. The result is a unit that looks as good after 10,000 hours as it did on day one.

The mechanical keys are rated for 10 million actuations, with a satisfying tactile response that matches real MCDU hardware.

content_sections.heading: Seamless Setup, Endless Possibilities
content_sections.description: Our companion software handles aircraft profile management, key mapping, and firmware updates. Pre-configured profiles for popular aircraft get you flying in minutes, while the advanced editor lets power users customize every aspect of their MCDU behavior.

data.warranty_info:
The CS-320A MCDU is covered by our comprehensive 2-year manufacturer warranty. This warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship under normal use conditions.

**What's Covered:**
- Display panel defects
- Key switch failures
- Electronic component failures
- USB connectivity issues

**What's Not Covered:**
- Physical damage from mishandling
- Water or liquid damage
- Unauthorized modifications
- Normal wear and tear

For warranty claims, contact support@coderise.io with your order number and a description of the issue.
data.os_requirements:
Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
macOS 12 Monterey or later
Linux with USB HID support

Minimum: USB 2.0 port
Recommended: USB 3.0 port for fastest response

Companion Software: 50MB disk space, .NET 6.0 Runtime (Windows)

seo.meta_title: CS-320A MCDU | Professional Flight Sim Control Unit
seo.meta_description: Experience airline-quality flight management with the CS-320A MCDU. Features 5.7" IPS display, 64 tactile keys, and seamless MSFS/X-Plane integration.

data.title: CS-737 Pro MCP
data.tagline: The Ultimate 737 Mode Control Panel for Serious Sim Pilots
data.overview:
The CS-737 Pro MCP recreates every detail of the Boeing 737 NG/MAX Mode Control Panel. From the precision-machined knobs to the authentic 7-segment displays, this panel delivers the tactile feedback and visual accuracy that makes your home cockpit feel like the real flight deck.

Designed in collaboration with active airline pilots and certified flight instructors, the CS-737 Pro represents the pinnacle of home cockpit hardware.

feature_bullets.text: 1:1 scale replica of the Boeing 737 NG/MAX MCP
7-segment LED displays with authentic font and brightness
Precision CNC-machined aluminum knobs with realistic feel
All switches, buttons, and annunciators fully functional
Korry-style backlit buttons with proper illumination
Native PMDG 737, Zibo, and ProSim integration
Dual-encoder design for SPD and HDG with push functions

content_sections.heading: Designed by Pilots, for Pilots
content_sections.description:
Every switch placement, every knob rotation, every button press has been validated against the real 737 MCP. Our engineering team worked with current 737 captains to ensure the CS-737 Pro feels exactly right.

The result is a panel that lets you build muscle memory that transfers to the real aircraft.

content_sections.heading: Built to Last a Lifetime
content_sections.description: The faceplate is precision-machined from 3mm aircraft aluminum, with laser-engraved legends that will never fade or wear off. The knobs are individually machined and anodized, with the same knurling pattern found on the real 737.

data.warranty_info:
The CS-737 Pro is backed by our industry-leading 3-year warranty, reflecting our confidence in the build quality and longevity of this premium product.

**Extended Coverage:**
- Full replacement for LED display failures
- Switch and encoder mechanism warranty
- Free firmware updates for life

Register your product within 30 days of purchase to activate the extended warranty.
data.os_requirements:
Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
macOS 12+
Linux (kernel 5.4+)

Simulator Support:
- MSFS 2020/2024
- X-Plane 11/12
- Prepar3D v4/v5

Configuration Software: Windows only

seo.meta_title: CS-737 Pro MCP | Boeing 737 Mode Control Panel Replica
seo.meta_description: Professional-grade Boeing 737 NG/MAX MCP replica with authentic 7-segment displays, precision encoders, and Korry-style buttons. Compatible with PMDG, Zibo, and ProSim.
